title: Gomen, Nanami-Kun To Wa Tsukiaenai
alternative_title: Gomen, Nanami-kun to wa Tsukiaenai ; ごめん、名波くんとは付き合えない
status: Gomen, Nanami-kun to wa Tsukiaenai ; ごめん、名波くんとは付き合えない
description:
Description :
        Koinui Mutsuki was on a date with Nanami, a classmate that she is in love with, when he confessed to her.But soon after confessing, he died in a sudden accident and while she was still reeling from the shock, a grim reaper suddenly appeared in front of her. The grim reaper then offered to send her back in time to save Nanami in exchange for a few years of her life.There are two conditions for Nanami's death and they are: "when Nanami confesses to Mutsuki" and "in second year of high school".Will Mutsuki be able to successfully avoid Nanami's confession and save his life?source: https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/iquwnyz/gomen-nanami-kun-to-wa-tsukiaenai

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 1: The Fruitless Circumstances Of A Single-Minded Love
